attributes.action: Legalise the use of  E-scooters and E-bikes for adults.
attributes.additional_details:
This will help avoid traffic congestion and help with the prevention of air pollution. It is better for the environment. 
The e-scooters are safer than the average bicycle because they are slower and easier to stop in an emergency. 
But I do not believe anyone under the age of 18 should be allowed to use either. They need to be classified as a form of transport and not toys.
attributes.background:
Legalise the use of privately owned e-bikes/e-scooters for over 18s who have a driving licence and insurance.
These should be allowed to be used on cycle lanes and roads with a speed limit of 30 miles per hour or less.
Scooters could be allowed on pavements where there is no danger to pedestrians.
